post.body: gosh, I haven't seen Stand By Me in so long. Almost forgot u were in that.
they do that all the time. Some of them don't even try the 1st attempt.

I went to see..."When the earth stood still", to celebrate when the Sun stands still, and "rise again"... ha

thanks.. perry is pretty good at perfecting the act of professional presentations. Say that 3x fast.
